subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
subSections.text:
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|醜態|しゅうたい}}: [[disgraceful]] [[behavior]]
* {{ja-r|醜聞|しゅうぶん}}: [[scandal]]
* {{ja-r|醜女|しこめ}}: [[ugly]] [[woman]]
* {{ja-r|醜男|ぶおとこ}}/{{ja-r|醜男|しこお}}: [[ugly]] [[man]]
* {{ja-r|醜草|しこぐさ}}: [[ugliness]]
{{der-mid}}
* {{ja-r|醜名|しゅうめい}}: [[scandal]]
* {{ja-r|醜悪|しゅうあく}}: [[ugliness]]
* {{ja-r|美醜|びしゅう}}: [[beauty]] and [[ugliness]] ([[appearance]])
* {{ja-r|老醜|ろうしゅう}}: [[ugliness]] due to [[old age]]
* {{ja-r|醜の木|みにくのき}}: [[ugly]] [[tree]]
{{der-bottom}}
